meanings.definition: a unit of information equal to one billion bytes.
meanings.sent1: My computer's hard drive can store many gigas of data.
meanings.sent2: The new smartphone has a memory capacity of 128 gigas.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally deleted several gigas of important files, oops!
meanings.sent4: Her brain processed information at a speed of gigas, like a supercomputer.
meanings.sent5: The gigas of data flowing through the internet can be overwhelming at times.

meanings.definition: a large, powerful, or influential person.
meanings.sent1: The CEO of the company is a gigas in the business world.
meanings.sent2: The famous actor was considered a gigas in Hollywood.
meanings.sent3: Imagine a gigas trying to hide in a tiny car, it would be hilarious!
meanings.sent4: Her presence in the room was like a gigas, commanding attention effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The gigas of a leader can inspire others to achieve great things.

meanings.definition: a type of large, powerful, or influential creature in mythology.
meanings.sent1: Legends speak of a gigas that roamed the mountains, feared by all.
meanings.sent2: The gigas in the ancient tales possessed immense strength and wisdom.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous gigas played pranks on unsuspecting travelers in the forest.
meanings.sent4: The gigas of the sea was said to control the tides with its mighty roar.
meanings.sent5: Children listened wide-eyed to stories of the gigas that protected the kingdom.
